CustomField.formula: IF( OR( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_1_1__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_1_2__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_1_3__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_1_4__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_1_5__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_1_6__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Score_1_7__c))) ), MAX( VALUE(TEXT(Score_1_1__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_1_2__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_1_3__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_1_4__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_1_5__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_1_6__c)), VALUE(TEXT(Score_1_7__c)) ), NULL )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total score from the Solution section. Only calculated where all scores are completed.
CustomField.label: Solution Score
